name: Blob Cat
description:
There was a cat enjoying its day, until suddenly it got blobbed into a miniature blobbed creature by an unknown force in the backyard. You must help the blobbed cat get its cat ears and tail back, avoiding the dangerous insects that roam the backyard.

Spacebar-Jump
Left and Right Arrow Keys-Movement
Heart-Gain 1 health
Blob cat has a total of 3 health, cannot over heal.
